news: COP29: Key agreements on Loss and Damage Fund operationalization.
Bharat Ratna 2024 awarded to Karpoori Thakur and others: Imp for Prelims.
ISRO's Aditya-L1 successfully placed in halo orbit around L1 point.
Interim Budget 2024: Focus on 'Viksit Bharat' and 4 castes - Poor, Youth, Women, Farmers.
Bihar Caste Survey Report released: Implications for reservation dynamics.
India's rank in Human Development Index (HDI) improved slightly.
Three new Criminal Law Bills passed to replace IPC, CrPC, and Indian Evidence Act.
Cleanest City Award 2024: Indore and Surat share top spot.
facts: Polity: The 'Basic Structure' doctrine was propounded in the Kesavananda Bharati case (1973), which recently completed 50 years.
History: The 'Sapta-Sindhu' region in Rigveda refers to the land of seven rivers, including the Saraswati.
Geography: The 'Ring of Fire' in the Pacific Ocean accounts for about 90% of the world's earthquakes.
Bihar Special: The 'Sher Shah Suri Tomb' in Sasaram is an example of Indo-Islamic architecture and stands in the middle of a lake.
Economy: 'Twin Balance Sheet Problem' refers to the financial stress of both banks (NPAs) and corporates (high debt).
Environment: 'Ramsar Convention' is related to the conservation of Wetlands. India currently has 80 Ramsar sites.
Science: CRISPR-Cas9 technology is used for Gene Editing, often called 'Genetic Scissors'.
Art & Culture: Madhubani Painting (Mithila Art) traditionally uses natural dyes and pigments like turmeric and lampblack.
